nodes.long_description:
The Signifier VR ist ein Mystery-Spiel im Tech-Noir-Stil mit nicht jugendfreien Inhalten, in dem deine Entscheidungen eine entscheidende Rolle spielen. Als Frederick Russell löst du Rätsel, wechselst dabei zwischen Welten hin und her, in denen sich experimentelle Psychologie und künstliche Intelligenz vermischen, und deckst mithilfe von Technologie die Wahrheit hinter dem Tod von Johanna Kast auf.

Das fotorealistische Rendering in Echtzeit ermöglicht dir das Eintauchen in eine detailreiche und fesselnde Realität. Wenn du die Dreamwalker-Maschine nutzt, gelangst du in eine surreale Welt aus objektiven und subjektiven Rekonstruktionen von Erinnerungen, erlernst neue psychologischen Konzepte, die wiederum neue Werkzeuge und Kräfte freischalten, und tauchst in eine vielschichtige Erzählung ein, die mehrere mögliche Enden besitzt. 

-	Erkunde neben der echten Welt auch objektive Erinnerungen und subjektive Träume, während du parallele Dimensionen durchquerst, um Rätsel zu lösen.
-	Für Meta Quest 2 neu überarbeitet.  Vollständige Bewegungsfreiheit, UI-Anpassungen, an VR angepasste Hauptfunktionen, überarbeite Rätsel, mehr interaktive Objekte und vieles mehr!
-	Sei auf alles gefasst, während du dich durch seltsame, unberechenbare Umgebungen bewegst, die voller spannender Entwicklungen stecken und zum Nachdenken anregen. 
-	Entwirre in der echten Welt ein komplexes Netz von Intrigen in verschiedenen Schwierigkeitsstufen und vielfältige Unterhaltungen – frei von Jump-Scares.
nodes.short_description: The Signifier VR ist ein Mystery-Spiel im Tech-Noir-Stil mit nicht jugendfreien Inhalten, in dem deine Entscheidungen eine entscheidende Rolle spielen. Als Frederick Russell löst du Rätsel, wechselst dabei zwischen Welten hin und her, in denen sich experimentelle Psychologie und künstliche Intelligenz vermischen, und deckst mithilfe von Technologie die Wahrheit hinter dem Tod von Johanna Kast auf.

nodes.long_description:
《The Signifier VR》是成人向黑色科幻懸疑遊戲，你的決定將影響事件的走向。化身弗雷德里克·羅素往返不同的世界，探討實驗心理學和人工智慧，藉助科技來揭曉約翰娜·卡斯特之死的真相。

逼真寫實的即時渲染帶你走進精緻逼真的世界。啟動深層大腦掃描系統Dreamwalker，即可進入主客觀記憶重構的超現實世界，瞭解心理學概念，解鎖新的工具與能力，走進層次豐富的多結局故事。 

-	橫跨並存的多個次元，探索真實世界、客觀記憶與主觀夢境，撥開重重迷霧。
-	專為Meta Quest 2頭戴式裝置重新調整，包括自由移動、UI調整、專為VR調整的核心功能、謎題修正、互動物件增加等等！
-	進入古怪又變幻莫測的場景，感受發人深省的劇情張力，面對意想不到的人與事。 
-	故事盤根錯節，現實陰謀錯綜複雜、真假難辨，疑雲難散。多個難度選擇供你選擇，對話涉及各種話題，無須擔心突如其來的驚嚇。
nodes.short_description: 《The Signifier VR》是成人向黑色科幻懸疑遊戲，你的決定將影響事件的走向。化身弗雷德里克·羅素往返不同的世界，探討實驗心理學和人工智慧，藉助科技來揭曉約翰娜·卡斯特之死的真相。

nodes.long_description:
The Signifier VR est un jeu d'aventure mystérieux dans lequel tous vos choix comptent. Vous incarnez Frederick Russell, et vous allez devoir résoudre des énigmes entre le monde réel et celui des souvenirs au fil d'une histoire mêlant psychologie expérimentale et intelligence artificielle. Faites bon usage de la technologie pour découvrir la vérité sur la mort de Johanna Kast.

Le rendu photoréaliste du jeu en temps réel vous permet d'explorer un monde détaillé particulièrement immersif. Grâce au Dreamwalker, vous allez pouvoir entrer dans le monde surréaliste de la reconstruction objective et subjective des souvenirs. Apprenez des concepts psychologiques qui vous permettront de débloquer de nouveaux outils et des pouvoirs inédits, et plongez-vous dans une histoire complexe à plusieurs fins possibles. 

-	Explorez le monde réel et les souvenirs objectifs et subjectifs en passant d'un univers à l'autre pour résoudre de nombreux mystères.
-	Refait pour Meta Quest 2.  Possibilités de déplacement totales, ajustements apportés à l'interface, fonctionnalités adaptées à la VR, énigmes révisées, davantage d'objets interactifs, et bien plus encore !
-	Vous ne serez pas au bout de vos surprises dans ces environnements étranges et imprévisibles regorgeant de tension et d'instants de réflexion. 
-	Dénouez une trame complexe d'intrigues du monde réel sur plusieurs niveaux de difficulté dans un jeu qui vous proposera des conversations sur des sujets extrêmement variés. Garanti sans jump sca
nodes.short_description: The Signifier VR est un jeu d'aventure mystérieux dans lequel tous vos choix comptent. Vous incarnez Frederick Russell, et vous allez devoir résoudre des énigmes entre le monde réel et celui des souvenirs au fil d'une histoire mêlant psychologie expérimentale et intelligence artificielle. Faites bon usage de la technologie pour découvrir la vérité sur la mort de Johanna Kast.

nodes.long_description:
《The Signifier VR》是一款面向成人的黑色科幻悬疑游戏，你的决策将影响事件的走向。你将化身弗雷德里希·罗素，往返不同的世界，探讨实验心理学和人工智能，借助科技手段，揭晓约翰娜·卡斯特之死的真相。

逼真写实的实时渲染带你走进一个高度精细、以假乱真的世界。启动深脑扫描系统Dreamwalker，你又将进入主客观记忆重构的超现实世界，了解心理学概念，解锁新的工具与能力，走进层层叠叠的多结局叙事。 

-	横跨并存的多个维度，探索真实世界、客观记忆与主观梦境，拨开团团迷雾。
-	专为Meta Quest 2重新适配，自由移动，UI调整，核心特色适配VR设备，谜题修改，互动对象增加，等等等等！
-	进入古怪而又变幻莫测的场景，全心感受发人深省的剧情张力，面对意想不到的人与事。 
-	多重叙事盘根错节，现实阴谋错综复杂，真假难辨，疑云难散，多个难度选择供你选择，对话涉及各类话题，无须担心突如其来的惊吓。
nodes.short_description: 《The Signifier VR》是一款面向成人的黑色科幻悬疑游戏，你的决策将影响事件的走向。你将化身弗雷德里希·罗素，往返不同的世界，探讨实验心理学和人工智能，借助科技手段，揭晓约翰娜·卡斯特之死的真相。

nodes.long_description:
This story-driven adventure follows a mystery of death and despair from reality into the surreal realms of objective memories and subjective experiences. Search the mind, solve puzzles, and unravel the dark truth in this psychological thriller.

The Signifier is a first-person tech-noir mystery adventure that blends investigation, experimental psychology, and artificial intelligence. 

Explore the real and surreal worlds, become immersed in fringe psychology, solve puzzles, and find the truth as Frederick Russell, an expert in AI and psychology, and the main researcher behind an experimental deep brain scanner called the Dreamwalker. Its controversial technology allows the exploration of the recorded senses and unconscious realms of the mind. He finds himself thrust into a spiral of intrigue when asked to use his creation after the vice president of the world’s biggest tech company turns up dead in her apartment.
nodes.short_description: This story-driven adventure follows a mystery of death and despair from reality into the surreal realms of objective memories and subjective experiences. Search the mind, solve puzzles, and unravel the dark truth in this psychological thriller.

nodes.long_description:
Signifier VR – это мрачная техно-мистерия в стиле «нуар», где каждый ваш выбор влияет на развитие сюжета игры. Отправляйтесь вместе со специалистом по искусственному интеллекту Фредериком Расселом в захватывающее путешествие между реальностями, решая головоломки и комбинируя методы экспериментальной психологии, работы с искусственным интеллектом и новые технологии, чтобы раскрыть убийство Джоанны Каст.

Фотореалистичный рендеринг в реальном времени позволит вам изучить виртуальное пространство в мельчайших деталях. С помощью уникального прибора под названием «Ловец снов» вы переместитесь в ирреальный мир субъективных и объективных воспоминаний, ознакомитесь с концепциями и инструментами современной психологии и раскроете все секреты этой многослойной, запутанной истории. 

-	Свободно перемещайтесь между сферами объективных и субъективных воспоминаний, где кроются истоки происходящих в реальном мире событий.
-	Игра переработана для Meta Quest 2.  Полная свобода движений, адаптированный интерфейс, ключевые механики, переделанные под использование в VR, обновленные головоломки, больше интерактивных объектов и другие изменения.
-	Будьте готовы к любым неожиданностям в странной, напряженной, непредсказуемой атмосфере этой нуарной игры, но скримеров не ждите. 
-	Распутайте паутину интриг между государством и крупным бизнесом, делая выбор в беседах на нескольких уровнях сложности.
nodes.short_description: Signifier VR – это мрачная техно-мистерия в стиле «нуар», где каждый ваш выбор влияет на развитие сюжета игры. Отправляйтесь вместе со специалистом по искусственному интеллекту Фредериком Расселом в захватывающее путешествие между реальностями, решая головоломки и комбинируя методы экспериментальной психологии, работы с искусственным интеллектом и новые технологии, чтобы раскрыть убийство Джоанны Каст.

nodes.long_description:
Signifier VR은 플레이어의 선택이 의미가 있는 성인용 기술 누아르 미스터리 게임입니다. 프레더릭 러셀이 되어 실험 심리학과 인공 지능이 뒤섞인 세계들 사이를 오가며 퍼즐을 풀고, 첨단 기술을 이용해서 요한나 캐스트의 죽음 이면의 진실을 밝혀내야 합니다.

사진처럼 현실적인 실시간 렌더링과 함께 세밀하고 몰입도 높은 현실을 탐험해 보세요. 그다음에는 드림워커 기계를 사용해서 객관적 및 주관적 기억을 재구축하는 초현실적인 세계에 들어가고, 새로운 도구와 힘을 잠금 해제하는 심리학적 개념을 습득하고, 다층적인 멀티 엔딩 스토리에 흠뻑 몰입해 보세요. 

-	실제 세계와 객관적 기억, 주관적 꿈을 탐험하며, 공존하는 차원을 넘나들어 미스터리를 해결하세요.
-	Meta Quest 2를 위해 재설계되었습니다.  완전한 로코모션, UI 조정, VR에 맞춰진 핵심 기능, 개편된 퍼즐, 상호작용 가능한 객체 등 게임의 다양한 측면이 개선되었습니다!
-	생각을 자극하는 긴장감으로 가득한 기이하고 예측 불가능한 세계를 누비며 놀라운 경험을 기대하세요. 
-	다양한 난이도와 다채로운 대화 주제를 탐색하며 실제 세계의 거미줄처럼 뒤엉킨 음모를 파헤치세요. 괜히 깜짝 놀라게 하는 공포는 없습니다.
nodes.short_description: Signifier VR은 플레이어의 선택이 의미가 있는 성인용 기술 누아르 미스터리 게임입니다. 프레더릭 러셀이 되어 실험 심리학과 인공 지능이 뒤섞인 세계들 사이를 오가며 퍼즐을 풀고, 첨단 기술을 이용해서 요한나 캐스트의 죽음 이면의 진실을 밝혀내야 합니다.

nodes.long_description:
Signifier VR apresenta um mistério maduro com temática tech-noir, onde suas escolhas fazem a diferença. Entre na pele de Frederick Russell, desloque-se entre reinos e use tecnologia para resolver quebra-cabeças que misturam psicologia experimental e inteligência artificial, e descobrir a verdade por trás da morte de Johanna Kast.

Explore uma realidade imersiva altamente detalhada com renderização fotorrealista em tempo real. A máquina Dreamwalker vai te levar para o mundo surreal das reconstruções objetivas e subjetivas da memória, onde você vai aprender conceitos psicológicos que desbloqueiam novas ferramentas e poderes, e aprofundar uma narrativa multifacetada e em camadas. 

-	Explore o mundo real, memórias objetivas e sonhos subjetivos enquanto cruza dimensões coexistentes para resolver mistérios.
-	Refeito para Meta Quest 2.  Locomoção completa, ajustes de interface do usuário, recursos principais adaptados para VR, quebra-cabeças revisados, objetos mais interativos e muito mais!
-	Surpreenda-se enquanto navega em ambientes estranhos e imprevisíveis, cheios de tensão provocada pelos pensamentos. 
-	Desvende uma complexa teia de intrigas do mundo real em diversos níveis de dificuldade e vários tópicos de conversa, sem sustos.
nodes.short_description: Signifier VR apresenta um mistério maduro com temática tech-noir, onde suas escolhas fazem a diferença. Entre na pele de Frederick Russell, desloque-se entre reinos e use tecnologia para resolver quebra-cabeças que misturam psicologia experimental e inteligência artificial, e descobrir a verdade por trás da morte de Johanna Kast.

nodes.long_description:
The Signifier VR es un juego de misterio, tecnología y género negro en el que tus decisiones son cruciales. Ponte en la piel de Frederick Russell y resuelve rompecabezas mientras te mueves entre mundos que combinan la psicología experimental con la inteligencia artificial. Usa la tecnología para descubrir la verdad que se esconde tras la muerte de Johanna Kast.

El renderizado fotorrealista en tiempo real te permite explorar una realidad de lo más inmersiva y con un alto nivel de detalle. Al usar el dispositivo Dreamwalker, entrarás en el mundo surrealista de las reconstrucciones de recuerdos objetivos y subjetivos. Además, aprenderás conceptos psicológicos, desbloquearás herramientas y poderes nuevos, y te sumergirás en una narrativa profunda con varios finales. 

-	Explora el mundo real, los recuerdos objetivos y los sueños subjetivos mientras atraviesas dimensiones coexistentes para resolver misterios.
-	Actualizado para Meta Quest 2.  Movilidad total, ajustes en la IU, funciones esenciales adaptadas a la RV, puzles revisados, más objetos interactivos ¡y muchas novedades más!
-	Transita entornos extraños e impredecibles llenos de tensión. Espera lo inesperado y vive momentos que te harán reflexionar. 
-	Desentraña una compleja red de misterios reales sin resolver, explora entornos con distintas dificultades y temas de conversación muy variados, ¡y disfruta de la experiencia sin sustos!
nodes.short_description: The Signifier VR es un juego de misterio, tecnología y género negro en el que tus decisiones son cruciales. Ponte en la piel de Frederick Russell y resuelve rompecabezas mientras te mueves entre mundos que combinan la psicología experimental con la inteligencia artificial. Usa la tecnología para descubrir la verdad que se esconde tras la muerte de Johanna Kast.

nodes.change_log:
* The dialog alternatives are now more differentiated between sitting and standing settings.
* Teleporter collision detection was corrected to better detect the landing spots and valid areas on which you can teleport.
* The size of the tutorial texts was decreased to fit better.
* The goAT colliders in Marie’s office were adjusted to feel smoother.
* The collider of the boiler was adjusted to make interactions more comfortable.
* The area where the exit icon appears (when close to an exit) was adjusted for every exit in the game.
* The size of a few dialog triggers was adjusted for smoother interactions.
* The button to exit the dog avatar was adjusted to make the interaction easier.
* The interaction with the Control Panel was improved by adding additional snap points.

Fixed the following bugs:

* When walking backwards, it was possible to climb on top of furniture.
* The masks puzzle was unsolvable due to some masks remaining activated even after deactivation.
* The player could fall at specific moments (e.g, when teleporting in the goAT elevator, entering the Club scene, exiting the framed picture, transitioning between scenarios during hacking, and going up the ladder in one of the final scenes).
* Raw data was sometimes hard to grab due to getting stuck inside a collider.
* The recall raw data function sometimes did not work.
* The hand sometimes got stuck in the grabbing position when using the timewarp mechanism.
* Entering the Control Panel using the machine at the warehouse while holding the teleport raycast caused the player to appear in the warehouse with the Control Panel's virtual hands, resulting in being stuck.
* The voyeurist’s shirt did not update according to the dialogs.
* The elevator in the goAT scene started open.
* It was possible to come out of the goAT elevator while it was closing.
* The dog avatar could be lost when entering a black room.
* There was an additional scene transition when interacting with an entity.
* Richard’s dog dialogs were not appearing.
* One of Laura’s animations did not work in VR.
* The sounds of orgies could be heard from the upper floors.
* The player could enter rooms and floors that should have been blocked.
* In one of the final scenes, the floor seemed too high.
* A tutorial hand indicating an exit was incorrectly displayed before needed.
* In the Dream Sequence, you could fall from the cornice down to the street, and being blocked to grab the ladder again.
At the Club, the dialog about the framed picture could be seen from inside the framed picture.
* Some interactions in the conversation with Marie at goAT were not working correctly.
* At the Club, the colliders of the ladder to the underground were not working correctly.
* The voyeurist did not look directly into the player's eyes.
* The refrigerator in Russell’s apartment was not visible.
* The sound of Johanna’s keyboard could be heard from the bathroom, which was confusing.
* The position of the dialog for the bookshelf was not centered correctly.
* A shader causing an unintended dithering effect on some shadows and other materials was deactivated.
* The game credits were not correctly positioned at the beginning of the credits screen.
* Other minor cosmetic bugs.
